channel.title: nsq on Laracro
channel.description: Recent content in nsq on Laracro

item.title: NSQ安装
item.description: nsq_install.sh #!/bin/bash src_path="/root/software" LOGFILE="/tmp/nsq-install-log" FILENAME=nsq-1.2.0.linux-amd64.go1.12.9.tar.gz FILEDIR=nsq-1.2.0.linux-amd64.go1.12.9 cd $src_path #wget package wget https://s3.amazonaws.com/bitly-downloads/nsq/$FILENAME tar -zxvf $FILENAME cd $src_path/$FILEDIR/bin cp $src_path/$FILEDIR/bin/* /usr/local/bin/ 保存并执行：sh ./nsq_install.sh ~ nsq -verison
